name: Stuart Thomason
content: Dr Stuart Thomason | Our people | University of Liverpool Skip to main content About Stuart has been working in higher education over multiple decades, with extensive experience in teaching and administration roles across the sector. He is currently part of the extended leadership team in the School of Computer Science & Informatics, with a focus on education, learning and teaching. He is also the director of undergraduate studies within the school, taking an overarching and holistic view of all programmes to ensure students are given the best possible chance to achieve their full potential. Stuart is also leading the school's implementation of the university's new curriculum framework. He is a Senior Fellow of Advance HE, acting as a mentor for colleagues, promoting best practice in teaching, and ensuring the school remains a vibrant and inclusive educational environment for staff and students. His scholarly work involves supervision of doctoral students using Computer Science and related technologies in educational contexts.
